K07pplg1__u:1: (LPG 1r) siddhaṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati
K07pplg1__u:2: sma gṛdhrākūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ
K07pplg1__u:3: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
K07pplg1__u:4: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
K07pplg1__u:6: ekapudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yad utāyuṣmantam ānandam* śaikṣaṃ srotāpannaṃ paṃcamātraiś
K07pplg1__u:7: ca bhikṣuṇīśatair yaśodharāmahāprajāpatīpramukhaiḥ saṃbahulaiś copāsakair upāsikābhiś
K07pplg1__u:8: ca sarvair dṛṣṭadharmabhiḥ mahatā ca bodhisatvasaṃghena sārdham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyair
K07pplg1__u:9: bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śunyatāvihāribhir
K07pplg1__u:12: ādeyavacanair akusīdair ārabdhavīryaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair akuhakair alapakair
K07pplg1__u:64: maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena etaiś cānyaiś cānekair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
K07pplg1__u:65: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṃkam
K07pplg1__u:66: ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya tatra niṣadya samādhirājo
K07pplg1__u:67: nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* yatra samādhau sarvasamādhayo 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ
K07pplg1__u:69: atha bhagavāṃ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃs tataḥ samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vyavalokayati sma /
K07pplg1__u:70: vyavalokya sarvakāyāt prabhāṃ prāmuñcat* tasyādhastāt padatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma :
K07pplg1__u:71: daśabhyaś ca pādāṃgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
K07pplg1__u:72: evaṃ dvābhyāṃ gulphābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jaṃghābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyām*
K07pplg1__u:73: kaṭer nābhimaṇḍalāt* dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyām* hṛdaye śrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt* saṣṭiṣaṣṭī
K07pplg1__u:75: daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaraṃti sma /
K07pplg1__u:76: evan dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyām* dvābhyām āṃsābhyām* grīvāyāś catasṛbhyo (LPG 2v)
K07pplg1__u:77: daṃṣṭrābhyaś catvāriṃśato dantebhyaḥ dvābhyāṃ cakṣubhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyām* dvābhyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:78: ghrāṇapuṭebhyām* madhye bhruvorṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt* mukhadvārāc ca ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī
K07pplg1__u:80: sarvāṇi ca tāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāvantam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K07pplg1__u:81: lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharitvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
K07pplg1__u:83: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:84: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tena raśmyavabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K07pplg1__u:85: atha bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
K07pplg1__u:86: lokadhātur mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt* pūrvasyāṃ ca diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
K07pplg1__u:87: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
K07pplg1__u:88: upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
K07pplg1__u:89: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena
K07pplg1__u:90: spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K07pplg1__u:91: atha bhagavān punar api yā sā tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayemaṃ (LPG 3r)
K07pplg1__u:93: pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
K07pplg1__u:94: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātuṃs tena mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
K07pplg1__u:95: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K07pplg1__u:96: atha bhagavān mukhadvārāj jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya sarvāvantam imaṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K07pplg1__u:97: lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa spharitvā smitaṃ prādurakārṣīt* tataś ca jihvendriyād anekāni
K07pplg1__u:99: sarvatra ca raśmyāṃ nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni santiṣṭhante sma /
K07pplg1__u:103: tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayaṃti sma /
K07pplg1__u:104: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanāṃ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:106: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
K07pplg1__u:107: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
K07pplg1__u:110: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* yaiś ca satvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
K07pplg1__u:111: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma buddhasamādhiṃ samāpadya tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma
K07pplg1__u:114: avedhat* prāvedhat* saṃprāvedhat* acalat prācalat saṃprācalat* akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat
K07pplg1__u:115: saṃprākṣubhyat* agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat* araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat* anteṣūnnamati sma /
K07pplg1__u:117: madhya aunnamati smānteṣv avanamati sma / mṛdukaḥ
K07pplg1__u:118: snigdhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sarvasukhasaṃjanano 'bhūt* atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena yāvanto
K07pplg1__u:120: te sarve samucchinnā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapannā
K07pplg1__u:121: abhūvan* cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
K07pplg1__u:122: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapannā abhūvan* atha te manuṣyās
K07pplg1__u:123: te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
K07pplg1__u:124: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtā bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:125: evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
K07pplg1__u:126: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukāsameṣu
K07pplg1__u:127: lokadhātuṣu sarvanarakāḥ sarvatiryagyonayaḥ sarvayamalokā samucchinnāḥ sarvākṣaṇāś
K07pplg1__u:128: cāstamitā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapadyante sma /
K07pplg1__u:129: atha te manuṣyās te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
K07pplg1__u:130: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra
K07pplg1__u:131: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti tān upasaṃkramanti smopasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtās
K07pplg1__u:132: tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān namasyanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:134: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ satvās te 'pi sarve cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:142: rogaspṛṣṭā vigatarogā abhūvan* vikalendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā abhūvan* klāntakāyā
K07pplg1__u:143: aklāntakāyā abhūvan* avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā vigatākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā bhavanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:144: sarvasatvāś ca sarvasatveṣu samacittā abhūvan* yad uta mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginīsamacittāḥ
K07pplg1__u:146: śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvākuśalavitarkavigatāḥ sarvasatvās tasmin samaye sarvasukhasamarpitā
K07pplg1__u:147: abhūvan* evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samanvāgatās tadyathā tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ
K07pplg1__u:148: sukhaṃ sarvasatvāś ca tasmin samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā abhūvan* yad evaṃ jānaṃti sma /
K07pplg1__u:149: sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu satyam /
K07pplg1__u:150: sādhv apramādaḥ sādhu maitrī sādhu karuṇā sādhv avihiṃsā prāṇibhūteṣu /
K07pplg1__u:151: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
K07pplg1__u:152: sasumeruṃ sacakravāḍaṃ sadevabhavanaṃ sendrakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ savaśavartinaṃ saśuddhāvāsaṃ
K07pplg1__u:153: sadevadānavakāyam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
K07pplg1__u:154: tadyathāpi nāma balavān divākaraḥ pariśuddhe gaganatale paurṇamāsyāṃ vā candramaṇḍalam*
K07pplg1__u:155: evam eva bhagavān pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya dakṣiṇasyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:157: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya
K07pplg1__u:158: sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śriyā tadyathāpi nāma
K07pplg1__u:159: sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvāṃs tadanyān parvatān abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate /
K07pplg1__u:160: tadyathāpi nāma candramaṇḍalam* sarvāṇi tārārūpāṇy abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsati tapati virocate /
K07pplg1__u:161: tadyathāpi nāma sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvāṃs tadanyān avabhāsān abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
K07pplg1__u:162: evam eva bhagavān daśasu dikṣu sadevakaṃ sendrakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśuddhāvāsam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
K07pplg1__u:163: punar yādṛśaṃ bhagavataḥ prakṛtyātmabhāvopadarśanaṃ tādṛśam iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv upadarśayati sma /
K07pplg1__u:164: atha yāvanto 'smiṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devanikāyāḥ
K07pplg1__u:165: yāvad brahmakāyikā paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ tuṣitā yāmās trāyastriṃśāś
K07pplg1__u:166: cāturmahārājakāyikā devanikāyās te sarve siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:167: te tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā divyāni puṣpāṇy ādāya
K07pplg1__u:168: divyāni mālyāni divyān gandhān divyāni vilepanāni divyāni cūrṇāni divyān vāsān divyāny
K07pplg1__u:172: divyāni cchatrāṇi divyāṃ dhvajān* divyāḥ patākā gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:173: upasaṃkramya taiḥ puṣpādibhir yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir bhagavantam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti
K07pplg1__u:175: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyā vineyā bhājanībhūtās te jalajasthalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramya tathāgatam abhipūjayaṃti sma /
K07pplg1__u:176: (LPG 5r) sarvāṇi ca tāni puṣpādīni yāvac chatradhvajapatākā bhagavaty avakīrṇāni /
K07pplg1__u:178: upari vaihāyase mūrdhasandhau mahāpuṣpādikūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt* tataś ca kūṭāgārād
K07pplg1__u:179: divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni pralaṃbante sma pralaṃbante smābhipralaṃbante sma /
K07pplg1__u:180: taiś ca puṣpapaṭṭadāmābhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsenātyarthaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
K07pplg1__u:181: yathā cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
K07pplg1__u:182: lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
K07pplg1__u:183: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ spuṭāś cābhūvan*
K07pplg1__u:184: tatra jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakadarśanam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvaivam
K07pplg1__u:185: abhavat* asmākaṃ purataḥ tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayatīti /
K07pplg1__u:186: yathā jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām evaṃ godānīyānāṃ pūrvavidehakānām uttarakauravāṇāṃ
K07pplg1__u:187: cāturmahārajakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvad aghaniṣṭhānān devānāṃ evaṃ sāhasre lokadhātau
K07pplg1__u:188: dvisāhasre trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvānām etad abhūt* asmākaṃ puratas
K07pplg1__u:190: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayā
K07pplg1__u:191: punar evāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt* yenāvabhāsena ya
K07pplg1__u:192: iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
K07pplg1__u:193: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān paśyanti sma /
K07pplg1__u:194: tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
K07pplg1__u:195: lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣur
K07pplg1__u:196: yathā ca pūrvasyān diśy evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 5v)
K07pplg1__u:197: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
K07pplg1__u:198: lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ
K07pplg1__u:200: atha pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātū
K07pplg1__u:201: ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate
K07pplg1__u:202: yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
K07pplg1__u:203: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
K07pplg1__u:204: taṃ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ taṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras
K07pplg1__u:205: tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrānta-r-upasaṃkramya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad
K07pplg1__u:206: avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya
K07pplg1__u:207: ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya ayaṃ cedṛśas tathāgatakāyaḥ sandṛśyate /
K07pplg1__u:208: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgatas taṃ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam
K07pplg1__u:209: etad avocat* eṣa kulaputra paścimāyān diśi sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir
K07pplg1__u:210: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati /
K07pplg1__u:212: tasyaiṣa īdṛśo 'nubhāva atha samantaraśmir bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ bhagavantaṃ

K07pplg1__u:248: tatra cāritramatir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:249: uttarasyān diśi jayā nāma lokadhātus tatra jayendro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas
K07pplg1__u:250: tiṣṭhati dhṛyate yāpayati tatra jayadatto nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatva yāvad vistareṇa kartavyam* //

K07pplg1__u:260: (LPG 7r) adhastāddiśi padmā nāma lokadhātus tatra padmaśrīr nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /

K07pplg1__u:262: gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātur nandā nāma tatra

K07pplg1__u:267: tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya taṃ bhagavantaṃ nandaśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad

K07pplg1__u:308: buddhakṣetraṃ yatra maṃjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ prativasati susthitamatiś ca devaputro
K07pplg1__u:311: yadā ca bhagavān ājñāsīt sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samāgataṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīprajāḥ
K07pplg1__u:312: sadevamānuṣīs tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvān* yadbhūyastvena kumārabhūtān tadā bhagavān

K07pplg1__u:315: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte ayuṣmāṃc chāriputro bhagavantam etad

K07pplg1__u:317: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad
K07pplg1__u:318: avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā asthānayogena
K07pplg1__u:326: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śāradvatīputra sthitvā bodhisatvena mahāsatvena catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayitavyāni smṛtyanupalabdhitām upādāya /
K07pplg1__u:328: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ paṃcendriyāṇi paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ
K07pplg1__u:329: paripūrayitavyaḥ śunyatāsamādhir ānimittaḥ samādhir apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ paripūrayitavyaḥ
K07pplg1__u:331: catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ paṃcābhijñā nava saṃjñāḥ vyādhyātmakasaṃjñā :
K07pplg1__u:340: buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtis tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtir udvegānusmṛtir maraṇānusmṛtiḥ kāyagatānusmṛtiḥ anityasaṃjñā duḥkhasaṃjñā /
K07pplg1__u:344: duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ
K07pplg1__u:345: dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ paricayajñānaṃ yathāvajjñānam* savitarkaḥ
K07pplg1__u:346: savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ avitarkaḥ (LPG 9r)
K07pplg1__u:347: avicāraḥ samādhir anājñātamājñāsyāmītīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam abhibhvāyatanaṃ kṛtsnāyatanaṃ catvāri saṃgrahavastūni /
K07pplg1__u:349: daśa bhūmayo daśa caryā daśa kṣāntayo viṃśatir adhyāśayāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ /
K07pplg1__u:351: tisro vidyā catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ catvāri vaiśāradyāny acyutāḥ paṃcābhijñāḥ ṣaṭ
K07pplg1__u:352: pāramitāḥ sapta dhanāny aṣṭau mahāpuruṣavitarkā nava satvāvāsā daśa tathāgatabalāny
K07pplg1__u:353: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā sarvākāravaropetaṃ sarvajñajñānam
K07pplg1__u:355: paripūrayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sarvavāsanānusandhikleśān
K07pplg1__u:356: prahātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ evaṃ hi
K07pplg1__u:358: bodhisatvanyāmaṃ śāradvatīputrāvakrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:359: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī prajñātukāmena te ca bhūmī atikrāntukāmenāvaivartikabhūmau ca sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:361: jñānam abhibhavitukāmena tathā dhāraṇīmukhasamādhimukhaṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena
K07pplg1__u:363: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitrīṇāṃ ca dānaṃ dadatāṃ
K07pplg1__u:364: yāvat prajñāṃ bhāvayatām ekānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādena sarvaṃ tat kuśalamūlam
K07pplg1__u:367: ekānumodanāsahagatena cittotpādenābhibhavitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:369: alpaṃ dānaṃ dadataḥ pariṇamanāyogena katham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāpramāṇāparimāṇaṃ bhaved iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:370: evam alpaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣato kṣāntiṃ bhāvayato 'lpaṃ vīryam ārabhamāṇasyālpaṃ dhyānaṃ

K07pplg1__u:372: bhaved iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:373: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthātukāmena dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena /
K07pplg1__u:381: dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:382: kathaṃ me sarvatra jātau buddhavigrahadarśanaṃ bhaved buddhacodanā /
K07pplg1__u:385: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhakāyaṃ pariniṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśataṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni
K07pplg1__u:386: pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* aśītim
K07pplg1__u:387: anuvyaṃjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ
K07pplg1__u:390: sarvapāpamitrapāpasahāyān vivarjayitukāmena sarvabuddhabodhisatvakalyāṇamitrāṇy ārāgayitukāmena sarvamāramārakāyikadevatān nirjetukāmena sarvāvaraṇīyāni viśodhayitukāmena /
K07pplg1__u:391: sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:392: bodhisatvakulaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena buddhakulam ārāgayitukāmena triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:393: kumārabhūmim anuprāptukāmena buddhabodhisatvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisatvabhūmīr
K07pplg1__u:394: atikrāntukāmena kṣipraṃ tathāgatabhūmīṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
K07pplg1__u:396: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair yair ākārair ākāṃkṣed buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ
K07pplg1__u:397: mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni me kuśalamūlāni ta ākārāḥ samṛddhyeyur iti bodhisatvena
K07pplg1__u:400: annena pānena yānair vastrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiḥ śayanair
K07pplg1__u:402: saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:403: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāsatvās tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena
K07pplg1__u:404: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu paṃcasv abhijñāsu triśaraṇagamane buddhadharmasaṃghaprasādapratilaṃbhe
K07pplg1__u:407: ye vā te gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvān mahāyāne samādāpayitukāmena /
K07pplg1__u:411: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*//
K07pplg1__u:412: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
K07pplg1__u:413: bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
K07pplg1__u:414: dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann
K07pplg1__u:416: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāni pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi
K07pplg1__u:417: tāni sarvāṇy ekacittotpādenopasaṃkrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:418: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
K07pplg1__u:421: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekasvaraghoṣeṇa pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:422: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
K07pplg1__u:423: gaṃgānadīvālikopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:425: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhotpādānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvakulam
K07pplg1__u:426: ārakṣitukāmena buddhavaṃśānucchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:440: abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:442: tathākāralakṣaṇāny avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:443: sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām avitathatām ananyatathatām avikāratathatāṃ yathāvattathātam avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:444: sarvadharmāṇān dharmadhātum avaboddhukāmena sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtakoṭim avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:445: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantyas tṛsāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau gaṃgānadīvālukās tāḥ sarvā jñātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:446: yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣv apskandho nadīṣu mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍākeṣu
K07pplg1__u:447: palvaleṣu tan sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣeptukāmena na ca tanniśṛtān
K07pplg1__u:450: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv agniskandhaḥ
K07pplg1__u:451: sa sarva ekajvālībhūto bhavet tadyathāpi nāma kalpoddāhe vartamāne tam enam ekena
K07pplg1__u:452: mukhavāyunā nirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:453: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yās trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bātamaṇḍalyo yā
K07pplg1__u:454: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vidhunuyur vikireyur vidhvaṃseyus tadyathāpi
K07pplg1__u:455: nāma busamuṣṭin tāḥ sarvā ekenāṅgulyāḥ prāntakena saṃcchādayitukāmena viṣkaṃbhayitukāmena
K07pplg1__u:457: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekaparyaṃkena spharitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:458: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ
K07pplg1__u:459: parvatarājās tān sarvān ekabālena badhvābhyutkṣipyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyāl lokadhātūn
K07pplg1__u:460: kṣipeyam iti tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:461: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tṛṇavṛkṣagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo
K07pplg1__u:464: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K07pplg1__u:465: buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tān sarvān ekapiṇḍapātena pratipādayitukāmena
K07pplg1__u:468: samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:469: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
K07pplg1__u:470: dikṣv aikaikasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ
K07pplg1__u:472: tan sarvāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena
K07pplg1__u:473: gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:474: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās
K07pplg1__u:475: tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmenaivaṃ samādhiskandhe prajñāskandhe vimuktiskandhe
K07pplg1__u:477: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K07pplg1__u:479: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe /
K07pplg1__u:482: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sakṛdāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K07pplg1__u:484: (LPG 12v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvanto daśadigloke sarvalokadhātuṣu satvās
K07pplg1__u:485: tān sarvāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena ca parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
K07pplg1__u:487: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ
K07pplg1__u:488: dadatā evaṃ śikṣitavyam* yad evaṃ dānaṃ datvā mahāphalaṃ bhavaty evaṃ dānaṃ datvā
K07pplg1__u:492: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad eva dānaṃ niśrāya cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
K07pplg1__u:493: evaṃ trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
K07pplg1__u:494: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad evaṃ dānaṃ niśrāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ tritīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam utpādyate ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
K07pplg1__u:495: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate evaṃ dānaṃ datvāryāṣṭāṃgo mārga utpādyate
K07pplg1__u:500: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ jānāty evam upāyakauśalyena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati
K07pplg1__u:501: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
K07pplg1__u:502: athāyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:506: dānasya dāyakasya parigrāhakasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:512: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām sarvabuddhaguṇān prajñātukāmenānuprāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:513: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:514: evaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ rūpyarūpiṇāṃ vyākṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ niyatāniyatānāṃ nairyāṇikānairyāṇikānām
K07pplg1__u:515: hānabhāgīyānāṃ viśeṣabhāgīyānāṃ pṛthagjānadharmāṇāṃ āryadharmāṇāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisatvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K07pplg1__u:516: sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:517: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām anuboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
K07pplg1__u:518: sarvadharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena bhūtakoṭiṃ prativeddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:519: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṃgamena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:520: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena (LPG 13v)
K07pplg1__u:522: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:523: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavatukāmena bodhisatvaparivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:524: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvadātrīṇāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:525: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dāne 'navagṛhītacittena bhavitukāmena
K07pplg1__u:526: dauḥśīlyacittaṃ pṛthakkartukāmena vyāpādacittam utsraṣṭukāmena kausīdyacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam
K07pplg1__u:528: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasattvān dānamaye puṇyakṛyāvastuni
K07pplg1__u:531: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākārāṇi paṃca cakṣuṃṣi niṣpādayitukāmena /
K07pplg1__u:532: māṃsacakṣur divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur niṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:533: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 14r)
K07pplg1__u:534: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi
K07pplg1__u:535: gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tān sarvān divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena
K07pplg1__u:536: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena
K07pplg1__u:537: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñātukāmena /
K07pplg1__u:538: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisatvacaryām anusmartukāmena
K07pplg1__u:539: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anekavidham ṛddhividhivikurvitaṃ saṃdraṣṭukāmena bodhisatvena
K07pplg1__u:541: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yan te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād
K07pplg1__u:542: daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ śrutvānācchedyena
K07pplg1__u:543: smṛtibalādhānena sandhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha
K07pplg1__u:544: etasminn antare sarvam avipraṇāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:545: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
K07pplg1__u:546: bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhīś ca pariniṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:547: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ
K07pplg1__u:549: tat sarvaṃ paryavāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:550: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
K07pplg1__u:551: sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
K07pplg1__u:552: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yat kiṃcit sarvabuddhair
K07pplg1__u:553: bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate tat sarvaṃ śrotukāmenodgrahītukāmena (LPG 14v)
K07pplg1__u:554: dhārayitukāmena paryavāptukāmena pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena tatra ca tathatvāya pratipattukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:555: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv
K07pplg1__u:556: andhākāratamisrā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭāḥ yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikāv
K07pplg1__u:557: evaṃ maheśākhyāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau na bhāsete na tapato na virocete tāḥ sarvāḥ avabhāsayitukāmena
K07pplg1__u:559: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
K07pplg1__u:560: dikṣu yā andhākāratamisrās tāḥ sarvā avabhāsayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
K07pplg1__u:562: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo
K07pplg1__u:563: yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatra lokadhātuṣu tān sarvasatvān
K07pplg1__u:566: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu : //
K07pplg1__u:567: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
K07pplg1__u:568: upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv
K07pplg1__u:569: andhāḥ satvās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanti badhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāṃ
K07pplg1__u:577: kim iti (LPG 15r) ye tatra samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
K07pplg1__u:578: lokadhātuṣv akṣaṇāpāyagatāḥ satvā nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te
K07pplg1__u:579: mamānubhāvena tataś cyavitvā mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante /
K07pplg1__u:580: sarvāṃś ca tān satvāṃc chīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane
K07pplg1__u:581: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau
K07pplg1__u:582: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
K07pplg1__u:584: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena tathāgateryāpathaṃ śikṣitukāmena tathāgatacaryācāritraviśuddhiṃ tathāgatasya
K07pplg1__u:586: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
K07pplg1__u:587: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ mahāsiṃhavijṛṃbhitena
K07pplg1__u:588: vijṛmbheyaṃ kim ity aham amoghavikrāmitayā vikrāmeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ caturaṃgulamātreṇa
K07pplg1__u:590: kim ity ahaṃ sahasrapatreṣu pādmeṣu pādatalau nikṣipan gaccheyaṃ pādatalasanniśṛtān prāṇino aviheṭhayan* kim ity ahaṃ sahasrāracakratalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ vicitrayan gaccheyam //
K07pplg1__u:591: kim ity ahaṃ samantāc cakrapramāṇamātraṃ mahāpṛthivyāḥ parivartayeyaṃ caṃkrame caṃkramyeya kim ity ahaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anucaṃkramyamāṇaḥ pṛthivīrajasā nānulipyeya /
K07pplg1__u:592: kim iti me ekaṃ vā yojanaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā /
K07pplg1__u:593: paṃca vā daśa vā viṃśatir vā tṛṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā paṃcāśad vā yojanaśataṃ vā /
K07pplg1__u:596: aprameyāṇi vā asaṃkhyeyāni vā acintyāni vā /
K07pplg1__u:599: amāpyāni vā buddhakṣetrāṇy anuvicarato 'nucaṃkramyamāṇasya na kāyaklame na cittam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:600: kim ity aham adhastāt kramatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrabhyāṃ raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K07pplg1__u:601: pramuṃcan* sarvākṣaṇāpāyaduḥkhāni praśamayya sarvasatvān sukhitān kuryām iti bodhisatvena
K07pplg1__u:603: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
K07pplg1__u:604: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ caturmahārājakāyikair devair yāvad akaniṣṭhair anekair
K07pplg1__u:605: devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkrameyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:606: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* /
K07pplg1__u:607: kim iti me bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣīdataś cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā duṣyasaṃstaraṃ kuryur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:608: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
K07pplg1__u:609: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato
K07pplg1__u:610: niṣaṇṇasya śayānasya sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta /
K07pplg1__u:612: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam
K07pplg1__u:613: upaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase 'bhiniṣkrameyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ
K07pplg1__u:614: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyaṃ pravartayataś
K07pplg1__u:615: cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyet*
K07pplg1__u:618: bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:619: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
K07pplg1__u:620: cittam utpādayitavyam* kim ity me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaḥ
K07pplg1__u:621: śrāvakasaṃgho bhavet* ekadharmadeśanayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā ekāsanikā arhanto bhaveyur
K07pplg1__u:622: bodhisatvā mahāsatvā sarve avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K07pplg1__u:623: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo bodhisatvasaṃgho bhavet* amitaṃ cāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhavet* amitā
K07pplg1__u:624: prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāmitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K07pplg1__u:625: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohaśabdo 'pi na bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:626: sarvasatvā evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu brahmacaryaṃ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu /
K07pplg1__u:627: kiṃ me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānaśabdo 'pi na bhavet tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:628: kim iti me saha śravaṇamātreṇa nāmadheyasya gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvā niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K07pplg1__u:629: tena śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
K07pplg1__u:630: yasmiṃc chāradvatīputra samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati /
K07pplg1__u:631: tasmin samaye āttamanaskā bhavaṃti catvāro mahārājā vayam atra catvāri pātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yāni paurvakair mahārājaiḥ paurvakeṣu tathāgateṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
K07pplg1__u:632: āttamanaskā bhavanti trāyastriṃśā devā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ āttamanaskā bhavanti paranirmitavaśavartino devā vayam asyopasthānaparicaryāṃ (LPG 16v)
K07pplg1__u:633: kariṣyāma evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyaṃte divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante / //
K07pplg1__u:634: āttamanaskā bhavanti brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā śubhakṛtsnā bṛhatphalā avṛhā atapāḥ
K07pplg1__u:635: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā āttamanaskā bhavanti aghaniṣṭhā devā vayam enam adhyeṣiṣyāmahe
K07pplg1__u:637: yasmin samaye śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate
K07pplg1__u:638: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir āttamanaskās tasmin* samaye bhavanti kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
K07pplg1__u:639: ca vayam asya mahāsatvasya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo //
K07pplg1__u:641: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā bodhisatvasyāmaithunasaṃyogaprasthānatāyai
K07pplg1__u:642: sa punar brahmacārī bhavati satvānāṃ bodhiniyojanatāyai na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ
K07pplg1__u:645: tat kasya hetoḥ kāmāṃ khalu punaḥ pratiṣevamāṇasya brahmalokopapattaye-r-antarāyo bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:647: tasmāt tarhi bodhisatvena mahāsatvena brahmacāriṇaivābhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā : //
K07pplg1__u:648: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kiṃ punar bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāryaputraduhitṛbhir bhavitavyam* bhagavān āha /
K07pplg1__u:649: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhir bhavitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:650: na bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ keṣāṃcid avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhāryāputraduhitribhir bhavitavyam*
K07pplg1__u:651: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya brahmacaryaṃsamādānaṃ bhavati (LPG 17r)
K07pplg1__u:652: te nityaṃ kumārabhūtā eva yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante kecit
K07pplg1__u:653: punaḥ bodhisatvā mahāsatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya paṃca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyānuttarāṃ
K07pplg1__u:655: kecit punaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāpratilabdhā apagatakāmakleśās te satvaparipākāya kāmaguṇaparibhogaṃ cotpādayanti na ca paribhuṃjante / //
K07pplg1__u:656: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito māyāvidyāsamyogajñāne
K07pplg1__u:657: sa paṃca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramamāṇaṃ krīḍantaṃ paricārayaṃtam
K07pplg1__u:658: ātmānam upadarśayet* tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā
K07pplg1__u:659: vā paṃca kāmāmaguṇāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyur āha /
K07pplg1__u:661: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā mahāyānamāyāsuśikṣitā māyopamadharmatāvihārapratilabdhāḥ
K07pplg1__u:664: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti na lipyaṃte anena paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣante /
K07pplg1__u:665: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā vadhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ pratyamitrāḥ kāmāḥ
K07pplg1__u:666: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ satvānāṃ paṃcabhyaḥ kāmaguṇebhyo vivecanārthaṃ
K07pplg1__u:668: na ca tair mādyanti na pramādyanti /
K07pplg1__u:671: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatiputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* bhagavān āha /
K07pplg1__u:672: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatva iti na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:680: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:681: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa bodhisatvo nāmasvabhāvena śunyaḥ na śunyatayā rūpaṃ śunyaṃ
K07pplg1__u:682: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā na śunyatayā vijñānaṃ śunyam* nānyatra rūpāc chunyatā nānyatra
K07pplg1__u:683: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānāc chunyatā /
K07pplg1__u:684: śunyataiva rūpaṃ śunyataiva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ śunyataiva vijñānaṃ tat kasya
K07pplg1__u:685: hetoḥ tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhiḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatvaḥ
K07pplg1__u:687: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ /
K07pplg1__u:688: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā :
K07pplg1__u:689: asad abhūtaṃ vitathasamaṃ māyādarśanaṃ svabhāvarahitaṃ asvabhāvaś cānutpādaḥ anirodaḥ
K07pplg1__u:690: na hānir na vṛddhiḥ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utpādaṃ na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:698: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:699: bodhir iti bodhisatva iti yad ucyate tad api na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:700: tat kasya hetoḥ kṛtriman nāma pratipratidharman te kalpitā āgantukena nāmadheyenābhūtaparikalpitena vyavahṛyante //
K07pplg1__u:702: tad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na manyate /
K07pplg1__u:704: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate /
K07pplg1__u:705: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti /
K07pplg1__u:706: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti /
K07pplg1__u:708: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti /
K07pplg1__u:709: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti /
K07pplg1__u:711: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ātmātmeti vyavahṛyate sa ca parigaveṣyamāṇo nopalabhyate /
K07pplg1__u:712: evaṃ satvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārakaḥ kārāpako vedako vedayitṛkaḥ
K07pplg1__u:713: utthāpakaḥ samutthāpako jānakaḥ paśyakaḥ sparśako vijānakaḥ sarva ete yathābhūtaṃ
K07pplg1__u:717: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatvan na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:723: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānan na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:725: tad api nāmaṃ na samanupaśyaty evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:726: tathāgataprajñāṃ sthāpayitvā sarvās tadanyāḥ prajñā yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
K07pplg1__u:728: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tad api na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:729: yenābhiniviśeta evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputrāyaṃ jaṃbudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
K07pplg1__u:730: bhikṣubhiḥ tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravaṇaṃ vā śālivanaṃ
K07pplg1__u:731: vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
K07pplg1__u:736: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate /
K07pplg1__u:737: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya yā prajñā sā sarvasatvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇārthāya pratyupasthitā //
K07pplg1__u:738: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhūya tiṣṭhati //
K07pplg1__u:740: bhikṣubhiḥ sacec chāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhaved
K07pplg1__u:741: yuṣmādṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:742: carataḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate //
K07pplg1__u:743: tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sacec chāradvatīputra pūrvasyān
K07pplg1__u:744: diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
K07pplg1__u:745: bhikṣubhiḥ evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād
K07pplg1__u:746: daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ
K07pplg1__u:747: teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitāyāḥ (LPG 19r)
K07pplg1__u:748: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate /
K07pplg1__u:750: yeyaṃ bhagavaṃc chrāvakāṇāṃ prajñā srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ arhataḥ
K07pplg1__u:751: yā ca pratyekabuddhasya bodhisatvasya tathāgatasya cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā
K07pplg1__u:752: sarvās tāḥ prajñā abhedaḥ śunyatā viviktāḥ anutpādaprakṛtikāḥ svabhāvaśunyā na ca
K07pplg1__u:753: bhagavann abhedasya viviktasyānutpādasya svabhāvaśunyasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate /
K07pplg1__u:754: tat kathaṃ bhagavan yeyaṃ bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati / //
K07pplg1__u:756: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:757: carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā mayā mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caratā
K07pplg1__u:758: sarvasatvānām arthaṃ kurvatā sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā
K07pplg1__u:759: api nu tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyupasthitā /
K07pplg1__u:762: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavaty asmābhir
K07pplg1__u:763: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā āha /
K07pplg1__u:765: tad anenāpi te śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam* yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
K07pplg1__u:766: prajñā yā ca bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñā imāṃ prajñām upanidhāyaiṣā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
K07pplg1__u:769: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati vayaṃ
K07pplg1__u:770: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
K07pplg1__u:771: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K07pplg1__u:773: abhisaṃbuddhyāparimāṇān aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti āha /
K07pplg1__u:776: mayā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
K07pplg1__u:777: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K07pplg1__u:779: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra khadyotakasya prāṇikajātasya naivaṃ bhavaty aham ābhayā
K07pplg1__u:780: jambudvīpam avabhāsayeyaṃ mamābhayā jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭo bhavet* evam eva śāradvatīputra
K07pplg1__u:781: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā yāvad
K07pplg1__u:784: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra sūryamaṇḍalam udāgacchat sarvajaṃbūdvīpam avabhāsena spharati /
K07pplg1__u:785: sarvajambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
K07pplg1__u:786: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
K07pplg1__u:787: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
K07pplg1__u:789: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramyāvaivartikabhūmīm anuprāpnoti /
K07pplg1__u:791: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo
K07pplg1__u:792: mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃc chunyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu (LPG 20r)
K07pplg1__u:793: dharmeṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramya buddhabhūmim anuprāpnoti / //
K07pplg1__u:795: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:797: prathamacittotpādaṃ śāradvatīputropādāya bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran
K07pplg1__u:798: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaḥ atrāntarād bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām
K07pplg1__u:799: agro vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya
K07pplg1__u:800: sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:801: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ paṃcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṃgasamanvāgatasya
K07pplg1__u:802: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ paṃcānām
K07pplg1__u:803: abhijñānāṃ ṣaṇṇām anusmṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
K07pplg1__u:804: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ paṃcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṃgānām
K07pplg1__u:807: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:808: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:809: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt* kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni prajñāyante /
K07pplg1__u:811: cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante
K07pplg1__u:813: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisatvās tathāgatā 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante / //
K07pplg1__u:815: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati bhagavān āha /
K07pplg1__u:816: (LPG 20v) paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati /
K07pplg1__u:817: tat kasya hetoḥ atyantapariśuddhā śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dakṣiṇā /
K07pplg1__u:818: tathā hi dāyakaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kasya dāyakaḥ anekeṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
K07pplg1__u:820: kathaṃ yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti veditavyaḥ bhagavān āha /
K07pplg1__u:821: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo rūpaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ saṃjñāśunyatāyāṃ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:822: punar aparaṃ cakṣuḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥśunyatāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:823: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
K07pplg1__u:825: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotradhātuśunyatāyāṃ śabdadhātuśunyatāyāṃ śrotravijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:829: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ duḥkhaśunyatāyāṃ samudayaśunyatāyāṃ nirodhaśunyatāyāṃ mārgaśunyatāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:830: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ skandhaśunyatāyāṃ dhātuśunyatāyāṃ āyatanaśunyatāyāṃ yukto
K07pplg1__u:831: yukta iti vaktavyaḥ avidyāśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:834: bhavaśunyatāyāṃ jātiśunyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmaśunyatāyām
K07pplg1__u:836: ye kecit saṃjñāgatāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:837: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:838: yukto yukta iti vaktavya evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K07pplg1__u:840: sa ābhir daśabhiḥ śunyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad yukta iti vā ayukta
K07pplg1__u:841: iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:842: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:843: na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:844: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:845: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:846: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:847: na rūpaṃ vedanayā sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:848: na vedanā saṃjñayā na saṃjñā saṃskārair na saṃskārā vijñānena sārdhaṃ samavasarantīti samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:849: na vijñānaṃ saṃskāraiḥ sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:850: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na sa kaścid dharmaḥ kenacid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasarati na visarati / //
K07pplg1__u:851: na yujyate na viyujyate prakṛtiśunyatām upādāya /
K07pplg1__u:852: yā śāradvatīputra rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpaṃ yā vedanāśunyatā na sā vedanā /
K07pplg1__u:856: tathā hi śāradvatīputra yā rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpayati /
K07pplg1__u:861: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāradvatīputrānyad rūpam anyā śunyatā nānyā śunyatānyad rūpam* rūpam eva śunyatā śunyataiva rūpam* evaṃ nānyā vedanānyā śunyatā /
K07pplg1__u:867: yā śāradvatīputra śunyatā na sā utpadyate na nirudhyate /
K07pplg1__u:870: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā yā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
K07pplg1__u:874: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na
K07pplg1__u:875: ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā kāyo na manaḥ na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na sparśo na dharmāḥ
K07pplg1__u:876: na tatra skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na tatra cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātur
K07pplg1__u:877: na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur
K07pplg1__u:878: na ghrāṇavijñānadhātur na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ na kāyadhātur
K07pplg1__u:879: na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātur na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātur
K07pplg1__u:880: na tatrāvidyā nāvidyānirodhaḥ na saṃskārā nna saṃskāranirodhaḥ na vijñānaṃ na vijñānanirodhaḥ
K07pplg1__u:881: na nāmarūpaṃ na nāmarūpanirodhaḥ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ na sparśo na
K07pplg1__u:882: sparśanirodhaḥ na vedanā na vedanānirodhaḥ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ nopādānaṃ nopādānanirodhaḥ
K07pplg1__u:883: na bhavo na bhavanirodhaḥ na jātir na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇanirodhaḥ
K07pplg1__u:884: na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgaḥ na prāptir nābhisamayaḥ na srotaāpanno
K07pplg1__u:886: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmī nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhan nārhatvam* na pratyekabodhir na
K07pplg1__u:887: pratyekabuddhaḥ na tatra mārgākārajñatā na bodhisatvaḥ na tatra bodhir na buddhaḥ
K07pplg1__u:888: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti
K07pplg1__u:889: vaktavyaḥ sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta
K07pplg1__u:891: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati
K07pplg1__u:892: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:893: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:894: na cakṣur yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:895: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyaṃ na mano yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:896: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:897: na śabdaṃ na gandhaṃ na rasaṃ na sparśaṃ na dharmān na cakṣurdhātuṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:898: na rūpadhātuṃ na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ yāvan na manodhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ na manovijñānadhātuṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:899: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:900: na samyakprahāṇeṣu na riddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṃgeṣu na mārge yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:901: yāvan na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:902: yāvan na sarvajñatāyāṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:903: anenāpi śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmāyogāviyogatām (LPG 22v) upādāya
K07pplg1__u:904: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śunyatāṃ śunyatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:905: na śunyatāyogam* nānimittam ānimittena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:906: nānimittayogam* nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati na viyojayati
K07pplg1__u:908: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śunyatā na yogo na viyogaḥ evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na
K07pplg1__u:909: yogo na viyogaḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
K07pplg1__u:910: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśunyatām avatarati /
K07pplg1__u:911: evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:912: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:913: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:914: tathā hi pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:915: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:916: tathā hy aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:917: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:918: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:919: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannair yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:920: tathā hi pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
K07pplg1__u:921: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:923: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntenāparāntena vā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:924: na pūrvāntam aparāntaṃ vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:926: evaṃ hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ (LPG 23r)
K07pplg1__u:928: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:932: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
K07pplg1__u:934: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati /
K07pplg1__u:935: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:936: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ
K07pplg1__u:937: sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan
K07pplg1__u:939: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:940: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:941: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:942: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:943: evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:944: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:945: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:946: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:947: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:948: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:949: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:950: (LPG 23v) tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:951: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:952: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:954: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
K07pplg1__u:955: na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:956: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati / //
K07pplg1__u:957: na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:958: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:959: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:960: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:961: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:962: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:963: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:964: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:965: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:966: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:968: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatiputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:969: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:970: tathā hi dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:971: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na dhyānapāramitāṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:972: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:973: evaṃ na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇardhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:974: evan na daśa tathāgatabalāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida (LPG 24r)
K07pplg1__u:975: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:976: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:977: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:978: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:979: na sarvajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:980: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:981: na bodhiṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:982: na boddhyā sarvajñatāṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:983: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:984: sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
K07pplg1__u:985: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:986: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhāva iti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:987: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na vijñānaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati / //
K07pplg1__u:989: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evan na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:990: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:991: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:995: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:999: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti (LPG 24v) yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:1001: na rūpaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1002: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1003: na rūpaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1004: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1005: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1006: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1007: na rūpam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyata iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1008: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyaya iti vā yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1011: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1013: na rūpaṃ sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1014: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1015: na rūpam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1016: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
K07pplg1__u:1019: caratīti ca na carati ceti nopaiti /
K07pplg1__u:1020: naiva carati ca na caratīti nopaiti /
K07pplg1__u:1021: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1022: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1023: na dānapāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1025: na satvaparipākahetoḥ na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ na daśānāṃ (LPG 25r)
K07pplg1__u:1029: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1032: na śunyatāśunyatāyā na mahāśunyatāyā na paramārthaśunyatāyā na saṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nāsaṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nātyantaśunyatāyā /
K07pplg1__u:1041: na dharmadhātor na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1042: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedaṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:1043: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1044: sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1045: na divyasya śrotrasya na paracittajñānasya na pūrvanivāsānusmṛter nardhipādānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1046: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1047: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
K07pplg1__u:1048: bhavaty aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
K07pplg1__u:1049: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi //
K07pplg1__u:1050: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
K07pplg1__u:1051: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi
K07pplg1__u:1053: bhavati yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante tat sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi /
K07pplg1__u:1054: ahaṃ tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ jñāsye /
K07pplg1__u:1056: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā tāṃ satvāṃś cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannāṃś ca drakṣyāmi /
K07pplg1__u:1058: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1059: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate /
K07pplg1__u:1060: yāny api kānicil laukikalokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāny api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanty anābhogenāparikalpitāni //
K07pplg1__u:1061: ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto ye ca
K07pplg1__u:1062: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
K07pplg1__u:1063: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā
K07pplg1__u:1064: bhagavantas taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pated iti /
K07pplg1__u:1065: ye ca catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvamm
K07pplg1__u:1066: ārakṣanti mā haiva kaścid bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāntarāyaṃ kārṣīt* ye ca kecit
K07pplg1__u:1067: kāyikā rogās te 'pi tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi dharme sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavanti /
K07pplg1__u:1068: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvān maitryā spharati / //
K07pplg1__u:1069: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1070: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukha samādhimukhāni pratibhānapratisaṃvinmukhāny āmukhībhavanti /
K07pplg1__u:1073: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir na kadācid virahito bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:1075: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati /
K07pplg1__u:1076: asti kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
K07pplg1__u:1079: tathā hi sa tad dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:1082: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1083: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
K07pplg1__u:1084: bhavati * kaccid ahaṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vābhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya
K07pplg1__u:1085: hetor na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddho nābhisaṃbudhyate /
K07pplg1__u:1087: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1088: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:1089: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1090: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dharmadhātor dharmāṇāṃ ca nānākaraṇaṃ karoti / //
K07pplg1__u:1091: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati //
K07pplg1__u:1092: dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya /
K07pplg1__u:1093: tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:1094: yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātuṃ śunyam iti yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:1096: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
K07pplg1__u:1097: (LPG 26v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
K07pplg1__u:1103: evaṃ na śrotradhātuṃ na śabdadhātuṃ na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na ghrāṇadhātuṃ na gandhadhātuṃ na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na jihvādhātuṃ na rasadhātuṃ na jihvāvijñānadhātum /
K07pplg1__u:1112: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ śunyatāyāṃ śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati /
K07pplg1__u:1115: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecic chāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitāyogas teṣām agrya-m-ākhyāyate /
K07pplg1__u:1116: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta-m-ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttara eṣa yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śunyatānimittāpraṇihitayoga /
K07pplg1__u:1117: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyākṛto vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ (LPG 27r)
K07pplg1__u:1118: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāmm arthaṃ karoti
K07pplg1__u:1119: na cāsyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujye 'ti vā viyujye 'ti vā māṃ buddhā
K07pplg1__u:1122: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣye / //
K07pplg1__u:1123: tat kasya hetos tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na vyatirekīkaroti / //
K07pplg1__u:1124: na ca dharmadhātoḥ kaṃcid anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
K07pplg1__u:1125: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cared yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākṛyeta /
K07pplg1__u:1127: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na satvasaṃjñotpadyate /
K07pplg1__u:1128: na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā na jānakapaśyakakārakavedakasaṃjñotpadyate / //
K07pplg1__u:1129: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantaṃ satvo nopalabhyate na nirudhyate /
K07pplg1__u:1130: na hi satvasyotpādo na nirodhaḥ yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ kathaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati /
K07pplg1__u:1131: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ satvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
K07pplg1__u:1135: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ ayaṃ
K07pplg1__u:1136: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ paramo yogaḥ
K07pplg1__u:1138: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati /
K07pplg1__u:1140: atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na mātsaryacittam utpādayati /
K07pplg1__u:1141: na dauḥśīlyacittaṃ na vyāpādacittaṃ na kausīdyacittaṃ (LPG 27v)
